name: Open Amazon, search a product, click first item
description: This test opens Amazon, searches for 'mobile', clicks the first item in results, and verifies that the product page opens successfully.
descriptionHtml: This test opens Amazon, searches for 'mobile', clicks the first item in results, and verifies that the product page opens successfully.
